attributes.action: Explain why Concorde was never truly sold to Virgin Atlantic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We British would never been saying time to say goodbye to Concorde if the 5% who run this GREAT COUNTRY would have allowed Richard Branson to purchase Concorde, come on BRITAIN ask for a detailed explanation as to why Bitish Airways & Co never allowed Richard control, (especially BA).
This brilliant machine which drew breathe, This BRITISH masterpiece, probably the last of the BRITISH empires greatest triumph.

I ask you are you BRITISH, I AM and I loved CONCORDE, what went wrong with it as clearly it was the debri on the runway?, expence, maybe?, yet Richard was willing to not say goodbye to such a great machine which LIVED.

BRITAIN & Friends do not say goodbye to our engineering masterpiece, the only plane to have 1 ACCIDENT in over 40 years (human error not pilot).?????

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
